wikipedia_page.main: Alan Mahood (born 26 March 1973) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played for numerous clubs including: Nottingham Forest, Greenock Morton, Kilmarnock, Ross County and St Johnstone.

response: McGraw returned to Morton as manager in 1985. Players he managed included Derek McInnes, John Anderson, David Wylie and Alan Mahood. Towards the end of his time as manager, McGraw's team that missed promotion to the Scottish Premier Division by one goal in the 1995-96 season.
